lagei þana hairu in fodr.
stikl þanei gaf mis atta, niu drigkau þana?
JOHN 18.12 þaruh hansa jah sa þusundifaþs jah andbahtos Iudaie undgripun Iesu jah gabundun ina, JOHN 18.13 jah gatauhun ina du Annin frumist;
sa was auk swaihra Kajafin, saei was auhumists weiha þis ataþnjis.
JOHN 18.14 wasuh þan Kajafa, saei garaginoda Iudaium þatei batizo ist ainana mannan fraqistjan faur managein.
JOHN 18.15 þaruh laistida Iesu Seimon Paitrus jah anþar siponeis.
sah þan siponeis was kunþs þamma gudjin jah miþinngalaiþ miþ Iesua in rohsn þis gudjins.
JOHN 18.16 iþ Paitrus stoþ at daurom uta.
þaruh usiddja ut sa siponeis anþar, saei was kunþs þamma gudjin, jah qaþ daurawardai jah attauh inn Paitru.
JOHN 18.17 þaruh qaþ jaina þiwi, so daurawardo, du Paitrau:
ibai jah þu þize siponje is þis mans?
iþ is qaþ:
ni im.
JOHN 18.18 þaruh stoþun skalkos jah andbahtos haurja waurkjandans, unte kald was, jah warmidedun sik;
jah þan was miþ im Paitrus standands jah warmjands sik.
JOHN 18.19 iþ sa auhumista gudja frah Iesu bi siponjans is jah bi laisein is.
JOHN 18.20 andhof imma Iesus:
ik andaugjo rodida manasedai;
ik sinteino laisida in gaqumþai jah in gudhusa, þarei sinteino Iudaieis gaqimand, jah þiubjo ni rodida waiht.
JOHN 18.21 ƕis mik fraihnis?
fraihn þans hausjandans ƕa rodidedjau du im;
sai, þai witun þatei qaþ ik.
JOHN 18.22 iþ þata qiþandin imma, sums andbahte atstandands gaf slah lofin Iesua qaþuh:
swau andhafjis þamma reikistin gudjin?
JOHN 18.23 andhof imma Iesus:
jabai ubilaba rodida, weitwodei bi þata ubil,
aiþþau jabai waila, duƕe mik slahis?
JOHN 18.24 þanuh insandida ina Annas gabundanana du Kajafin, þamma maistin gudjin.
JOHN 18.25 iþ Seimon Paitrus was standands jah warmjands sik.
þaruh qeþun du imma:
niu jah þu þize siponje þis is?
iþ is afaiaik jah qaþ:
ne, ni im.
JOHN 18.26 qaþ sums þize skalke þis maistins gudjins,
sah niþjis was þammei afmaimait Paitrus auso:
niu þuk saƕ ik in aurtigarda miþ imma?
JOHN 18.27 þaruh aftra afaiaik Paitrus, jah suns hana hrukida.
JOHN 18.28 iþ eis tauhun Iesu fram Kajafin in praitoriaun.
þanuh was maurgins.
iþ eis ni iddjedun in praitoriaun, ei ni bisaulnodedeina, ak matidedeina pasxa.
JOHN 18.29 þaruh atiddja ut Peilatus du im jah qaþ:
ƕo wrohe bairiþ ana þana mannan?
JOHN 18.30 andhofun jah qeþun du imma:
nih wesi sa ubiltojis, ni þau weis atgebeima þus ina.
JOHN 18.31 þaruh qaþ im Peilatus:
nimiþ ina jus jah bi witoda izwaramma stojiþ ina.
iþ eis qeþunuh du imma Iudaieis:
unsis ni skuld ist usqiman manne ainummehun.
JOHN 18.32 ei waurd fraujins usfullnodedi, þatei qaþ, bandwjands ƕileikamma dauþau skulda gaswiltan.
JOHN 18.33 þaruh galaiþ in praitauria aftra Peilatus jah wopida Iesu qaþuh imma:
þu is þiudans Iudaie?
JOHN 18.34 andhof Iesus:
abu þus silbin þu þata qiþis þau anþarai þus qeþun bi mik?
JOHN 18.35 andhof Peilatus:
waitei ik Iudaius im?
so þiuda þeina jah gudjans anafulhun þuk mis;
ƕa gatawides?
JOHN 18.36 andhof Iesus:
þiudangardi meina nist us þamma fairƕau;
iþ us þamma fairƕau wesi meina þiudangardi, aiþþau andbahtos meinai usdaudidedeina, ei ni galewiþs wesjau Iudaium.
iþ nu þiudangardi meina nist þaþro.
JOHN 18.37 þaruh qaþ imma Peilatus:
an nuh þiudans is þu?
andhafjands Iesus qaþ:
þu qiþis ei þiudans im ik.
ik du þamma gabaurans im jah du þamma qam in þamma fairƕau ei weitwodjau sunjai.
ƕazuh saei ist sunjos, hauseiþ stibnos meinaizos.
JOHN 18.38 þanuh qaþ imma Peilatus:
ƕa ist so sunja!
jah þata qiþands aftra galaiþ ut du Iudaium jah qaþ im:
ik ainohun fairino ni bigita in þamma.
JOHN 18.39 iþ ist biuhti izwis ei ainana izwis fraletau in pasxa;
wileidu nu ei fraletau izwis þana þiudan Iudaie?
JOHN 18.40 iþ eis hropidedun aftra allai qiþandans:
